Uses of Package
com.dougnoel.sentinel.exceptions

Packages that use com.dougnoel.sentinel.exceptions
Package
Description
com.dougnoel.sentinel.exceptions
Package to store all of our custom exceptions.
com.dougnoel.sentinel.steps
Generic step definitions.
  • Classes in com.dougnoel.sentinel.exceptions used by com.dougnoel.sentinel.exceptions
    Class
    Description
    ConfigurationNotFoundException
    Exception thrown if a configuration value cannot be found in the configuration file or on the command line.
    ElementNotFoundException
    Thrown when an element is not found.
    FileNotFoundException
    Allows us to pass in the stack trace and additional text to a FileNotFoundException
    IOException
    Allows us to pass in the stack trace and additional text to a IOException.
    PageNotFoundException
    SentinelException to catch error thrown if a Page Object is not found or some operation to get a Page fails
    SentinelException
    Base Sentinel Exception so that we can throw multiple exception types and wrap them up into one at the top for cleaner code.
  • Classes in com.dougnoel.sentinel.exceptions used by com.dougnoel.sentinel.steps

    Description
    SentinelException
    Base Sentinel Exception so that we can throw multiple exception types and wrap them up into one at the top for cleaner code.
